languages.text: {n}Лицу Адальберта возвращается привычная мягкость.{/n} "Злые языки не ведают устали, пороча честь Вольного Торговца, но все наветы рассыпятся в прах перед благочестивостью Вашей Светлости".

{n}Adalbert's face regains its familiar gentle expression.{/n} "Poison tongues may tirelessly belittle the Rogue Trader's honour, but all slander will turn to dust before Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s righteous devotion."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицу Адальберта возвращается привычная мягкость.{/n} "Злые языки не ведают устали, пороча честь Вольного Торговца, но все наветы рассыпятся в прах перед благочестивостью Вашей Светлости".

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert's face regains its familiar gentle expression.{/n} "The poison tongues are tireless in smearing the Rogue Trader's honour, but all slander will turn to dust before Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s righteous devotion."

{n}Adalbert's face regains its familiar gentle expression.{/n} "Poison tongues may tirelessly belittle the Rogue Trader's honour, but all slander will turn to dust before Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s righteous devotion."

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Adalbert retrouve son affabilité habituelle.{/n} « Des langues de vipères tentent inlassablement de ternir l'honneur de Votre Seigneurie, mais votre dévotion inébranlable aura tôt fait de réduire leurs calomnies à néant. »
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert's face regains its familiar gentle expression.{/n} "Poison tongues may tirelessly belittle the Rogue Trader's honour, but all slander will turn to dust before Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s righteous devotion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage d'Adalbert retrouve son affabilité habituelle.{/n} « Des langues de vipères tentent inlassablement de ternir l'honneur de Votre Seigneurie, mais votre dévotion inébranlable aura tôt fait de réduire leurs calomnies à néant. »

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Adalbert recupera su familiar cordialidad.{/n} «Las malas lenguas son infatigables en su empeño por socavar el honor {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, pero las calumnias se reducen a polvo ante su virtuosa devoción»"
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert's face regains its familiar gentle expression.{/n} "Poison tongues may tirelessly belittle the Rogue Trader's honour, but all slander will turn to dust before Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s righteous devotion."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Adalbert recupera su familiar cordialidad.{/n} «Las malas lenguas son infatigables en su empeño por socavar el honor {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, pero las calumnias se reducen a polvo ante su virtuosa devoción»"

languages.text: {n}阿达伯特脸上又恢复了他一直以来的温和表情。{/n}“尽管那些恶毒的喉舌妄图玷污行商浪人的名誉，但在您正义的奉献面前，所有的诽谤都将化为灰烬。”
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert's face regains its familiar gentle expression.{/n} "Poison tongues may tirelessly belittle the Rogue Trader's honour, but all slander will turn to dust before Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s righteous devotion."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿达伯特脸上又恢复了他一直以来的温和表情。{/n}“尽管那些恶毒的喉舌妄图玷污行商浪人的名誉，但在您正义的奉献面前，所有的诽谤都将化为灰烬。”

languages.text: {n}アダルバートの表情は、いつもと同じで穏やかだった。{/n} 「毒舌家たちはローグトレーダーの名誉を汚すためにたゆまぬ努力を続けている。だが、すべての誹謗中傷は陛下の正しい献身の前に塵と化すだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert's face regains its familiar gentle expression.{/n} "Poison tongues may tirelessly belittle the Rogue Trader's honour, but all slander will turn to dust before Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s righteous devotion."

traits.locale_text: {n}アダルバートの表情は、いつもと同じで穏やかだった。{/n} 「ポイズン・トングたちはローグトレーダーの名誉を汚すためにたゆまぬ努力を続けている。だが、すべての誹謗中傷は陛下の正しい献身の前に塵と化すだろう」

languages.text: {n}Adalbert macht wieder sein gewohnt freundliches Gesicht.{/n} "Vergiftete Zungen beschmieren unermüdlich die Ehre {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, doch vor der rechtschaffenen Hingabe Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} zerfällt jede Verleumdung zu Staub."
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert's face regains its familiar gentle expression.{/n} "Poison tongues may tirelessly belittle the Rogue Trader's honour, but all slander will turn to dust before Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s righteous devotion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert macht wieder sein gewohnt freundliches Gesicht.{/n} "Vergiftete Zungen beschmieren unermüdlich die Ehre {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, doch vor der rechtschaffenen Hingabe Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} zerfällt jede Verleumdung zu Staub."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert'in yüzü o tanıdık nazik ifadesini yeniden kazanıyor.{/n} "Zehirli diller Hür Tacir'in onuruna zarar vermeye çalışıyor olabilir ancak tüm iftiralar {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin erdemi ve adanmışlığı karşısında toz olacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert's face regains its familiar gentle expression.{/n} "Poison tongues may tirelessly belittle the Rogue Trader's honour, but all slander will turn to dust before Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s righteous devotion."
